org.gstreamer.interfaces
Class Tuner

java.lang.Object
  org.gstreamer.lowlevel.NativeValue
      org.gstreamer.interfaces.GstInterface
          org.gstreamer.interfaces.Tuner

public class Tuner
extends GstInterface

Interface for elements providing tuner operations
